1.name: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
1.description: In fifteenth century Paris, the brother of the archdeacon plots with the gypsy king to foment a peasant revolt. Meanwhile, a freakish hunchback falls in love with the gypsy queen.

2.name: Safety Last!
2.description: A boy leaves his small country town and heads to the big city to get a job. As soon as he makes it big his sweetheart will join him and marry him. His enthusiasm to get ahead leads to some interesting adventures.

3.name: The Ten Commandments
3.description: After hearing the story of Moses, the sons of a devout Christian mother go their own ways, while the atheist brother's breaking of the Ten Commandments leads to tragedy.

4.name: Our Hospitality
4.description: A man returns to his Appalachian homestead. On the trip, he falls for a young woman. The only problem is her family has vowed to kill every member of his family.

5.name: A Woman of Paris: A Drama of Fate
5.description: A kept woman runs into her former fiancé and finds herself torn between love and comfort.

6.name: La roue
6.description: Sisif, a railwayman, and his son Elie fall in love with the beautiful Norma (who Sisif rescued from a train crash when a baby and raised as his daughter), with tragic results. Originally ...                See full summary »

7.name: The Pilgrim
7.description: The Tramp is an escaped convict who is mistaken as a pastor in a small town church.

8.name: Three Ages
8.description: The misadventures of Buster in three separate historical periods.

9.name: Hollywood
9.description: Angela comes to Hollywood with only two things: Her dream to become a movie star, and Grandpa. She leaves an Aunt, a brother, Grandma, and her longtime boyfriend back in Centerville. ...                See full summary »

10.name: La souriante Madame Beudet
10.description: An unhappily married woman devises a scheme to get rid of her husband.

11.name: Scaramouche
11.description: When a nobleman murders his best friend, a lawyer becomes a revolutionary with his heart set on vengeance.

12.name: The White Sister
12.description: A young woman becomes a nun when she believes her sweetheart has been killed, but things get complicated when he returns alive.

13.name: Love, Life and Laughter
13.description: A chorus girl, who dreams of being a music-hall star, falls for an impoverished author.

14.name: Why Worry?
14.description: A hypochondriac vacations in the tropics for the fresh air - and finds himself in the middle of a revolution instead.

15.name: The Covered Wagon
15.description: Two wagon caravans converge at what is now Kansas City, and combine for the westward push to Oregon. On their quest the pilgrims will experience desert heat, mountain snow, hunger, and ...                See full summary »

16.name: Souls for Sale
16.description: A young woman hits Hollywood, determined to become a star.

17.name: Broken Hearts of Broadway
17.description: The story of a young actress trying to attain stardom on Broadway.

18.name: Schatten - Eine nächtliche Halluzination
18.description: A wealthy man invites the local wealthy bachelors over for a puppet show about men who covet another man's wife. The puppeteer is actually a witch and gives the men nightmares about what could happen if they date the lady of the house.

19.name: Rosita
19.description: Rosita, a peasant singer in Seville, captures the attention of the King.

20.name: Flaming Youth
20.description: An ingenue becomes a bob-haired flapper and enters into a ménage-à-trois with her mother's lover amid the sexual revolution of the Jazz Age.

21.name: Coeur fidèle
21.description: Marie wants to escape from her job and also from her lover, Paul, an unemployed drunk. She dreams of going off with Jean, a dockworker. The two men quarrel and fight over Marie on two ...                See full summary »

22.name: Zaza
22.description: Zaza is an actress and the favorite at an open-air theater in a small French town. When diplomat Bernard Dufresne comes to the village, he stays away for fear he will fall for her. But when Zaza is badly injured, he has no choice.

23.name: Merry-Go-Round
23.description: A nobleman, posing as a necktie salesman, falls in love with the daughter of a circus puppeteer, even though he is already married to the daughter of his country's war minister.

24.name: The Chechahcos
24.description: A fire engulfs a shipload of prospectors and adventurers making their way to Alaska. In the confusion, Mrs. Stanlaw is separated from her young daughter, who ends up in the care of '...                See full summary »

25.name: The White Rose
25.description: A wealthy young Southern aristocrat, Joseph, graduates from a seminary and, before he takes charge of his assigned parish, decides to go out and see what "the real world" is all about. He ...                See full summary »

26.name: The Extra Girl
26.description: Sue Graham is a small town girl who wants to be a motion picture star. She wins a contract when a picture of a very pretty girl is sent to a studio instead of her picture. When she arrives ...                See full summary »

27.name: Norrtullsligan
27.description: About a group of office girls hardships in the male world set in 1907. A collective fighting for female solidarity, civil rights and the conflict between love and work.

28.name: Das alte Gesetz
28.description: Baruch Mayr, son of an orthodox rabbi from a poor shtetl in Galizia, decides to break with the family tradition and leave the shtetl to become an actor. Due to this behaviour his father ...                See full summary »

29.name: Adam's Rib
29.description: Michael Ramsay only has time for gathering his fortune in wheat. His wife seeks comfort elsewhere and, to avoid a scandal, her daughter Matilda assumes her mother's guilt. Ramsay nearly goes broke but gets rich again; his wife returns.

30.name: Black Oxen
30.description: A Manhattan playboy falls in love with a mysterious European woman, whom he notices as an exact double for a famous socialite who disappeared at the turn of the century. At first, he thinks...                See full summary »

31.name: Bella Donna
31.description: Bella Donna, a seductive woman snares Nigel Armine into marriage and he takes her to Egypt to live. Tired of her simple husband, Bella becomes involved with brutish Baroudi.

32.name: Raskolnikow
32.description: Student Raskolnikow, who has written an article about laws and crime, proposing the thesis, that un-ordinary people can commit crimes if their actions are necessary for the benifit of ...                See full summary »

33.name: The Wolf Man
33.description: The youngest son of a noble English family turns into a wolf man whenever he partakes in alcohol.

34.name: The Cheat
34.description: After losing money she embezzled, a socialite borrows cash from a foreign "prince" who expects sexual favors in return.

35.name: Chu-Chin-Chow
35.description: In Baghdad a girl escapes from a robber sheikh and thwarts a plot to rob a merchant.

36.name: The Gold Diggers
36.description: Stephen Lee doesn't want his nephew Wally Sanders to marry chorus girl Violet Dayne, because he believes all chorus girls to be ruthless gold diggers, always chasing after the men's money. ...                See full summary »

37.name: The Spanish Dancer
37.description: A love story between Don Cesar de Bazan and a beautiful Gypsy dancer.

38.name: Der Schatz
38.description: In and around a bell maker near Marburg (today Slovenia) people tell the story of a treasure that was hidden during the Turki invasion of 1683, the year the Turkish Army was besieging ...                See full summary »

39.name: Wild Bill Hickok
39.description: After the America Civil War ends, important political and military figures gather in Washington D.C. Gunfighter Wild Bill Hickok (William Hart) retires to Dodge City where he hangs up his ...                See full summary »

41.name: Der Kaufmann von Venedig
41.description: The Venetian merchant Antonio is in a difficult financial situation. To help his friend Bassanio, who is campaigning for the heiress Portia, he goes, although in mutual disgust, to the ...                See full summary »

42.name: The Bright Shawl
42.description: Charles Abbott is a wealthy adventurer in Cuba of the 1850s. He is in love with Narcissa but goes after La Clavel to obtain information on the Spanish. He becomes implicated in the death of...                See full summary »

43.name: White Tiger
43.description: Three crooks pull off a magnificent crime. As they're forced to hide out together they slowly begin to distrust each other.

44.name: The Shock
44.description: A gang of blackmailers sends a cripple to San Francisco to expose a banker they have been blackmailing. However, the cripple meets and falls in love with the banker's daughter.

45.name: Bluebeard's 8th Wife
45.description: The beautiful daughter of a French nobleman, Mona de Briac is induced to marry wealthy American John Brandon because her family needs his money. She learns that her husband has divorced ...                See full summary »

46.name: I.N.R.I.
46.description: By the director of Cabinet of Dr.Caligari, this is the Passion embedded in a contemporary story. An anarchist jailed for an attempted assassination is told the Passion story by the prison ...                See full synopsis »

47.name: Cameo Kirby
47.description: Wrongfully blamed for the death of Col. John Randall, Cameo Kirby (Gilbert) must find the true villain and clear his name before he can declare his love for Adele (Olmstead), the dead man's...                See full summary »

49.name: Ashes of Vengeance
49.description: When Empress Catherine of France launches an attack on French Protestants known as Huguenots, the Comte de la Roche saves the life of his enemy, the Huguenot Rupert de Vrieac, by making him...                See full summary »

50.name: Human Wreckage
50.description: An attorney's wife is determined to fight the evils of addictive substances.
